Uses of Class
io.netty.util.concurrent.AbstractEventExecutorGroup

  • Packages that use AbstractEventExecutorGroup 
    Package Description
    io.netty.channel
    The core channel API which is asynchronous and event-driven abstraction of various transports such as a NIO Channel.
    io.netty.channel.epoll
    Optimized transport for linux which uses EPOLL Edge-Triggered Mode for maximal performance.
    io.netty.channel.kqueue
    BSD specific transport.
    io.netty.channel.local
    A virtual transport that enables the communication between the two parties in the same virtual machine.
    io.netty.channel.nio
    NIO-based channel API implementation - recommended for a large number of connections (>= 1000).
    io.netty.channel.oio
    Old blocking I/O based channel API implementation - recommended for a small number of connections (< 1000).
    io.netty.util.concurrent
    Utility classes for concurrent / async tasks.

    • Uses of AbstractEventExecutorGroup in io.netty.channel

      Subclasses of AbstractEventExecutorGroup in io.netty.channel 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstractEventLoopGroup
      Skeletal implementation of EventLoopGroup.
      class  DefaultEventLoopGroup
      Deprecated.
      class  MultithreadEventLoopGroup
      Abstract base class for EventLoopGroup implementations that handles their tasks with multiple threads at the same time.
      class  MultiThreadIoEventLoopGroup
      IoEventLoopGroup implementation that will handle its tasks with multiple threads.
      class  ThreadPerChannelEventLoopGroup
      Deprecated.
      this will be remove in the next-major release.

    • Uses of AbstractEventExecutorGroup in io.netty.channel.epoll

      Subclasses of AbstractEventExecutorGroup in io.netty.channel.epoll 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  EpollEventLoopGroup
      Deprecated.
      Use MultiThreadIoEventLoopGroup with EpollIoHandler.newFactory().

    • Uses of AbstractEventExecutorGroup in io.netty.channel.kqueue

      Subclasses of AbstractEventExecutorGroup in io.netty.channel.kqueue 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  KQueueEventLoopGroup
      Deprecated.
      Use MultiThreadIoEventLoopGroup with KQueueIoHandler.newFactory().

    • Uses of AbstractEventExecutorGroup in io.netty.channel.local

      Subclasses of AbstractEventExecutorGroup in io.netty.channel.local 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  LocalEventLoopGroup
      Deprecated.
      Use MultiThreadIoEventLoopGroup with LocalIoHandler.newFactory().

    • Uses of AbstractEventExecutorGroup in io.netty.channel.nio

      Subclasses of AbstractEventExecutorGroup in io.netty.channel.nio 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  NioEventLoopGroup
      Deprecated.
      Use MultiThreadIoEventLoopGroup with NioIoHandler.newFactory().

    • Uses of AbstractEventExecutorGroup in io.netty.channel.oio

      Subclasses of AbstractEventExecutorGroup in io.netty.channel.oio 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  OioEventLoopGroup
      Deprecated.
      use NIO / EPOLL / KQUEUE transport.

    • Uses of AbstractEventExecutorGroup in io.netty.util.concurrent

      Subclasses of AbstractEventExecutorGroup in io.netty.util.concurrent 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  DefaultEventExecutorGroup
      Default implementation of MultithreadEventExecutorGroup which will use DefaultEventExecutor instances to handle the tasks.
      class  MultithreadEventExecutorGroup
      Abstract base class for EventExecutorGroup implementations that handles their tasks with multiple threads at the same time.
